channel.title: How do i move my stalls?
channel.description: I was wondering how i move my stalls or add new ones? i know it has to do with global objects but i dont know how it works? can someone help me out please thanks.

item.title: How do i move my stalls?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright, ill do a simple small tut on that…
Open client.java and use the search thing for:

makeGlobalObject

Do that until you find a code similar to this (numbers will proly be dif but it should be remotely the same)

makeGlobalObject(2816, 3512, 2213, 0, 10); // Bank

i thought of the code from top of my head… jsut to use for an example…

alright now the cords are the 1st and 2nd set of numbers…
X= 1st Set (2816)
Y= 2nd Set (3512)

But umm… the object is the 3rd number
(2213) in this case… is a bank booth on almost any server… as long as its a 317…

the 4th number is the rotation o the object (basically how it faces)

the 5th one (just make sure its a 10… i have no idea what he 5th number acually does lol

Read full topic
